value.name: creature
value.tooltip: Creature reference for swarm characters ONLY

value.name: scariness
value.tooltip: the inherent scariness of the character

value.name: normal body vitality
value.tooltip: maximum body vitality of our unit

value.name: normal shield vitality
value.tooltip: maximum shield vitality of our unit

value.name: legendary body vitality
value.tooltip: maximum body vitality of our unit (on legendary)

value.name: legendary shield vitality
value.tooltip: maximum shield vitality of our unit (on legendary)

value.name: body recharge fraction
value.tooltip: fraction of body health that can be regained after damage

value.name: soft ping threshold with shields
value.tooltip: damage necessary to trigger a soft ping when shields are up

value.name: soft ping threshold no shields
value.tooltip: damage necessary to trigger a soft ping when shields are down

value.name: soft ping min interrupt time
value.tooltip: minimum time before a soft ping can be interrupted

value.name: hard ping threshold with shields
value.tooltip: damage necessary to trigger a hard ping when shields are up

value.name: hard ping threshold no shields
value.tooltip: damage necessary to trigger a hard ping when shields are down

value.name: hard ping min interrupt time
value.tooltip: minimum time before a hard ping can be interrupted

value.name: current damage decay delay
value.tooltip: current damage begins to fall after a time delay has passed since last the damage

value.name: current damage decay time
value.tooltip: amount of time it would take for 100% current damage to decay to 0

value.name: recent damage decay delay
value.tooltip: recent damage begins to fall after a time delay has passed since last the damage

value.name: recent damage decay time
value.tooltip: amount of time it would take for 100% recent damage to decay to 0

value.name: body recharge delay time
value.tooltip: amount of time delay before a shield begins to recharge

value.name: body recharge time
value.tooltip: amount of time for shields to recharge completely

value.name: shield recharge delay time
value.tooltip: amount of time delay before a shield begins to recharge

value.name: shield recharge time
value.tooltip: amount of time for shields to recharge completely

value.name: stun threshold
value.tooltip: stun level that triggers the stunned state (currently, the 'stunned' behavior)

value.name: extended shield damage threshold
value.tooltip: Amount of shield damage sustained before it is considered 'extended'

value.name: extended body damage threshold
value.tooltip: Amount of body damage sustained before it is considered 'extended'

value.name: suicide radius
value.tooltip: when I die and explode, I damage stuff within this distance of me.

value.name: max vision distance
value.tooltip: maximum range of sight

value.name: central vision angle
value.tooltip: horizontal angle within which we see targets out to our maximum range

value.name: max vision angle
value.tooltip: maximum horizontal angle within which we see targets at range

value.name: peripheral vision angle
value.tooltip: maximum horizontal angle within which we can see targets out of the corner of our eye

value.name: peripheral distance
value.tooltip: maximum range at which we can see targets our of the corner of our eye

value.name: hearing distance
value.tooltip: maximum range at which sounds can be heard

value.name: notice projectile chance
value.tooltip: random chance of noticing a dangerous enemy projectile (e.g. grenade)

value.name: notice vehicle chance
value.tooltip: random chance of noticing a dangerous vehicle

value.name: combat perception time
value.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we are already in combat or searching for them

value.name: guard perception time
value.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we have been alerted

value.name: non-combat perception time
value.tooltip: time required to acknowledge a visible enemy when we are not alerted

value.name: first ack surprise distance
value.tooltip: If a new prop is acknowledged within the given distance, surprise is registerd

value.name: maximum aiming deviation
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our weapon

value.name: maximum looking deviation
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head

value.name: noncombat look delta L
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head left away from our aiming vector when not in combat

value.name: noncombat look delta R
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head right away from our aiming vector when not in combat

value.name: combat look delta L
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head left away from our aiming vector when in combat

value.name: combat look delta R
value.tooltip: how far we can turn our head right away from our aiming vector when in combat

value.name: noncombat idle looking
value.tooltip: rate at which we change look around randomly when not in combat

value.name: noncombat idle aiming
value.tooltip: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when not in combat

value.name: combat idle looking
value.tooltip: rate at which we change look around randomly when searching or in combat

value.name: combat idle aiming
value.tooltip: rate at which we change aiming directions when looking around randomly when searching or in combat

value.name: scatter killed count
value.tooltip: After the given number of deaths, the swarm scatters

value.name: scatter radius
value.tooltip: the distance from the target that the swarm scatters

value.name: scatter time
value.tooltip: amount of time to remain scattered

value.name: perlin offset scale
value.tooltip: amount of randomness added to creature's throttle

value.name: offset period
value.tooltip: how fast the creature changes random offset to throttle

value.name: perlin idle movement threshold
value.tooltip: a random offset lower then given threshold is made 0. (threshold of 1 = no movement)

value.name: perlin combat movement threshold
value.tooltip: a random offset lower then given threshold is made 0. (threshold of 1 = no movement)

value.name: ready time bounds
value.tooltip: Character will pause for given time before engaging threat

value.name: Crouch danger threshold
value.tooltip: When danger rises above the threshold, the actor crouches

value.name: Stand danger threshold
value.tooltip: When danger drops below this threshold, the actor can stand again.

value.name: Fight danger move threshold
value.tooltip: When danger goes above given level, this actor switches firing positions

value.name: melee chance
value.tooltip: chance of initiating a melee within a 1 second period

value.name: melee attack timeout
value.tooltip: Give up after given amount of time spent charging

value.name: melee attack delay timer
value.tooltip: don't attempt again before given time since last melee

value.name: melee delay timer
value.tooltip: time between melee leaps

value.name: berserk weapon
value.tooltip: when I berserk, I pull out a ...

value.name: Evasion danger threshold
value.tooltip: Consider evading when immediate danger surpasses threshold

value.name: Evasion delay timer
value.tooltip: Wait at least this delay between evasions

value.name: Evasion chance
value.tooltip: If danger is above threshold, the chance that we will evade. Expressed as chance of evading within a 1 second time period

value.name: Evasion proximity threshold
value.tooltip: If target is within given proximity, possibly evade

value.name: dive retreat chance
value.tooltip: Chance of retreating (fleeing) after danger avoidance dive

value.name: hide behind cover time
value.tooltip: how long we stay behind cover after seeking cover

value.name: Cover vitality threshold
value.tooltip: When vitality drops below this level, possibly trigger a cover

value.name: Cover shield fraction
value.tooltip: trigger cover when shield drops below this fraction (low shield cover impulse must be enabled)

value.name: Cover check delay
value.tooltip: amount of time I will wait before trying again after covering

value.name: Emerge from cover when shield fraction reaches threshold
value.tooltip: Emerge from cover when shield fraction reaches threshold

value.name: Cover danger threshold
value.tooltip: Danger must be this high to cover. At a danger level of 'danger threshold', the chance of seeking cover is the cover chance lower bound (below)

value.name: Danger upper threshold
value.tooltip: At or above danger level of upper threshold, the chance of seeking cover is the cover chance upper bound (below)

value.name: Cover chance
value.tooltip: Bounds on the chances of seeking cover.

value.name: Proximity self-preserve
value.tooltip: When the proximity_self_preservation impulse is enabled, triggers self-preservation when target within this distance

value.name: Disallow cover distance
value.tooltip: Disallow covering from visible target under the given distance away

value.name: proximity melee distance
value.tooltip: When self preserving from a target less than given distance, causes melee attack (assuming proximity_melee_impulse is enabled)

value.name: unreachable enemy danger threshold
value.tooltip: When danger from an unreachable enemy surpasses threshold, actor cover (assuming unreachable_enemy_cover impulse is enabled)

value.name: scary target threshold
value.tooltip: When target is aware of me and surpasses the given scariness, self-preserve (scary_target_cover_impulse)

value.name: Shield threshold
value.tooltip: When shield vitality drops below given amount, retreat is triggered by low_shield_retreat_impulse

value.name: Scary target threshold
value.tooltip: When confronting an enemy of over the given scariness, retreat is triggered by scary_target_retreat_impulse

value.name: Danger threshold
value.tooltip: When perceived danger rises above the given threshold, retreat is triggered by danger_retreat_impulse

value.name: Proximity threshold
value.tooltip: When enemy closer than given threshold, retreat is triggered by proximity_retreat_impulse

value.name: minmax forced cower time bounds
value.tooltip: actor cowers for at least the given amount of time

value.name: minmax cower timeout bounds
value.tooltip: actor times out of cower after the given amount of time

value.name: proximity ambush threshold
value.tooltip: If target reaches is within the given proximity, an ambush is triggered by the proximity ambush impulse

value.name: awareness ambush threshold
value.tooltip: If target is less than threshold (0-1) aware of me, an ambush is triggered by the vulnerable enemy ambush impulse

value.name: leader dead retreat chance
value.tooltip: If leader-dead-retreat-impulse is active, gives the chance that we will flee when our leader dies within 4 world units of us

value.name: peer dead retreat chance
value.tooltip: If peer-dead-retreat-impulse is active, gives the chance that we will flee when one of our peers (friend of the same race) dies within 4 world units of us

value.name: second peer dead retreat chance
value.tooltip: If peer-dead-retreat-impulse is active, gives the chance that we will flee when a second peer (friend of the same race) dies within 4 world units of us

value.name: zig-zag angle
value.tooltip: The angle from the intended destination direction that a zig-zag will cause

value.name: zig-zag period
value.tooltip: How long it takes to zig left and then zag right.

value.name: retreat grenade chance
value.tooltip: The likelihood of throwing down a grenade to cover our retreat

value.name: backup weapon
value.tooltip: If I want to flee and I don't have flee animations with my current weapon, throw it away and try a ...

value.name: Uncover distance bounds
value.tooltip: Distance of uncover point from target. Hard lower limit, soft upper limit.

value.name: min presearch time
value.tooltip: If the min presearch time expires and the target is (actually) outside the min-certainty radius, presearch turns off

value.name: max presearch time
value.tooltip: Presearch turns off after the given time

value.name: min suppressing time
value.tooltip: if the min suppressing time expires and the target is outside the min-certainty radius, suppressing fire turns off

value.name: idle pose delay time
value.tooltip: time range for delays between idle poses

value.name: look comment time
value.tooltip: How long does the player look at an AI before the AI responds?

value.name: look long comment time
value.tooltip: How long does the player look at the AI before he responds with his 'long look' comment?

value.name: max distance
value.tooltip: maximum distance from entry point that we will consider boarding

value.name: abort distance
value.tooltip: give up trying to get in boarding seat if entry point is further away than this

value.name: max speed
value.tooltip: maximum speed at which we will consider boarding

value.name: flurry damage threshold
value.tooltip: when more than x damage is caused a juggernaut flurry is triggered

value.name: flurry time
value.tooltip: flurry lasts this long

value.name: maximum firing range
value.tooltip: we can only fire our weapon at targets within this distance

value.name: minimum firing range
value.tooltip: weapon will not be fired at target closer than given distance

value.name: bombardment range
value.tooltip: we offset our burst targets randomly by this range when firing at non-visible enemies (zero = never)

value.name: Max special target distance
value.tooltip: Specific target regions on a vehicle or unit will be fired upon only under the given distance

value.name: super-ballistic range
value.tooltip: we try to aim our shots super-ballistically if target is outside this range (zero = never)

value.name: Ballistic firing bounds
value.tooltip: At the min range, the min ballistic fraction is used, at the max, the max ballistic fraction is used

value.name: Ballistic fraction bounds
value.tooltip: Controls speed and degree of arc. 0 = high, slow, 1 = low, fast

value.name: custom stand gun offset
value.tooltip: custom standing gun offset for overriding the default in the base actor

value.name: custom crouch gun offset
value.tooltip: custom crouching gun offset for overriding the default in the base actor

value.name: special-fire mode
value.tooltip: the type of special weapon fire that we can use

value.name: special-fire situation
value.tooltip: when we will decide to use our special weapon fire mode

value.name: special-fire chance
value.tooltip: how likely we are to use our special weapon fire mode

value.name: special-fire delay
value.tooltip: how long we must wait between uses of our special weapon fire mode

value.name: special damage modifier
value.tooltip: damage modifier for special weapon fire (applied in addition to the normal damage modifier. zero = no change)

value.name: special projectile error
value.tooltip: projectile error angle for special weapon fire (applied in addition to the normal error)

value.name: drop weapon loaded
value.tooltip: amount of ammo loaded into the weapon that we drop (in fractions of a clip, e.g. 0.3 to 0.5)

value.name: drop weapon ammo
value.tooltip: total number of rounds in the weapon that we drop (ignored for energy weapons)

value.name: normal accuracy bounds
value.tooltip: Indicates starting and ending accuracies at normal difficulty

value.name: normal accuracy time
value.tooltip: The amount of time it takes the accuracy to go from starting to ending

value.name: heroic accuracy bounds
value.tooltip: Indicates starting and ending accuracies at heroic difficulty

value.name: heroic accuracy time
value.tooltip: The amount of time it takes the accuracy to go from starting to ending

value.name: legendary accuracy bounds
value.tooltip: Indicates starting and ending accuracies at legendary difficulty

value.name: legendary accuracy time
value.tooltip: The amount of time it takes the accuracy to go from starting to ending

value.name: rate of fire
value.tooltip: how many times per second we pull the trigger (zero = continuously held down)

value.name: target tracking
value.tooltip: how well our bursts track moving targets. 0.0= fire at the position they were standing when we started the burst. 1.0= fire at current position

value.name: target leading
value.tooltip: how much we lead moving targets. 0.0= no prediction. 1.0= predict completely.

value.name: burst origin radius
value.tooltip: how far away from the target the starting point is

value.name: burst origin angle
value.tooltip: the range from the horizontal that our starting error can be

value.name: burst return length
value.tooltip: how far the burst point moves back towards the target (could be negative)

value.name: burst return angle
value.tooltip: the range from the horizontal that the return direction can be

value.name: burst duration
value.tooltip: how long each burst we fire is

value.name: burst separation
value.tooltip: how long we wait between bursts

value.name: weapon damage modifier
value.tooltip: what fraction of its normal damage our weapon inflicts (zero = no modifier)

value.name: projectile error
value.tooltip: error added to every projectile we fire

value.name: burst angular velocity
value.tooltip: the maximum rate at which we can sweep our fire (zero = unlimited)

value.name: maximum error angle
value.tooltip: cap on the maximum angle by which we will miss target (restriction on burst origin radius

value.name: rate of fire
value.tooltip: how many times per second we pull the trigger (zero = continuously held down)

value.name: target tracking
value.tooltip: how well our bursts track moving targets. 0.0= fire at the position they were standing when we started the burst. 1.0= fire at current position

value.name: target leading
value.tooltip: how much we lead moving targets. 0.0= no prediction. 1.0= predict completely.

value.name: burst origin radius
value.tooltip: how far away from the target the starting point is

value.name: burst origin angle
value.tooltip: the range from the horizontal that our starting error can be

value.name: burst return length
value.tooltip: how far the burst point moves back towards the target (could be negative)

value.name: burst return angle
value.tooltip: the range from the horizontal that the return direction can be

value.name: burst duration
value.tooltip: how long each burst we fire is

value.name: burst separation
value.tooltip: how long we wait between bursts

value.name: weapon damage modifier
value.tooltip: what fraction of its normal damage our weapon inflicts (zero = no modifier)

value.name: projectile error
value.tooltip: error added to every projectile we fire

value.name: burst angular velocity
value.tooltip: the maximum rate at which we can sweep our fire (zero = unlimited)

value.name: maximum error angle
value.tooltip: cap on the maximum angle by which we will miss target (restriction on burst origin radius

value.name: grenade type
value.tooltip: type of grenades that we throw

value.name: trajectory type
value.tooltip: how we throw our grenades

value.name: minimum enemy count
value.tooltip: how many enemies must be within the radius of the grenade before we will consider throwing there

value.name: enemy radius
value.tooltip: we consider enemies within this radius when determining where to throw

value.name: grenade ideal velocity
value.tooltip: how fast we LIKE to throw our grenades

value.name: grenade velocity
value.tooltip: the fastest we can possibly throw our grenades

value.name: grenade ranges
value.tooltip: ranges within which we will consider throwing a grenade

value.name: collateral damage radius
value.tooltip: we won't throw if there are friendlies around our target within this range

value.name: grenade chance
value.tooltip: how likely we are to throw a grenade in one second

value.name: grenade throw delay
value.tooltip: How long we have to wait after throwing a grenade before we can throw another one

value.name: grenade uncover chance
value.tooltip: how likely we are to throw a grenade to flush out a target in one second

value.name: anti-vehicle grenade chance
value.tooltip: how likely we are to throw a grenade against a vehicle

value.name: grenade count
value.tooltip: number of grenades that we start with

value.name: dont drop grenades chance
value.tooltip: how likely we are not to drop any grenades when we die, even if we still have some

value.name: ai pathfinding radius
value.tooltip: (Ground vehicles)

value.name: ai destination radius
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) Distance within which goal is considered reached

value.name: ai deceleration distanceworld units
value.tooltip: (All vehicles)Distance from goal at which AI starts to decelerate

value.name: ai turning radius
value.tooltip: (Warthog, Pelican, Ghost) Idealized average turning radius (should reflect actual vehicle physics)

value.name: ai inner turning radius tr
value.tooltip: (Warthog-type) Idealized minimum turning radius (should reflect actual vehicle physics)

value.name: ai ideal turning radius tr
value.tooltip: (Warthogs, ghosts) Ideal turning radius for rounding turns (barring obstacles, etc.)

value.name: ai banshee steering maximum
value.tooltip: (Banshee)

value.name: ai max steering angle
value.tooltip: (Warthog, ghosts, wraiths)Maximum steering angle from forward (ultimately controls turning speed)

value.name: ai max steering delta
value.tooltip: (pelicans, dropships, ghosts, wraiths)Maximum delta in steering angle from one tick to the next (ultimately controls turn acceleration)

value.name: ai oversteering scale
value.tooltip: (Warthog, ghosts, wraiths)

value.name: ai oversteering bounds
value.tooltip: (Banshee) Angle to goal at which AI will oversteer

value.name: ai sideslip distance
value.tooltip: (Ghosts, Dropships) Distance within which Ai will strafe to target (as opposed to turning)

value.name: ai avoidance distance
value.tooltip: (Banshee-style) Look-ahead distance for obstacle avoidance

value.name: ai min urgency
value.tooltip: (Banshees)The minimum urgency with which a turn can be made (urgency = percent of maximum steering delta)

value.name: ai throttle maximum
value.tooltip: (All vehicles)

value.name: ai goal min throttle scale
value.tooltip: (Warthogs, Dropships, ghosts)scale on throttle when within 'ai deceleration distance' of goal (0...1)

value.name: ai turn min throttle scale
value.tooltip: (Warthogs, ghosts) Scale on throttle due to nearness to a turn (0...1)

value.name: ai direction min throttle scale
value.tooltip: (Warthogs, ghosts) Scale on throttle due to facing away from intended direction (0...1)

value.name: ai acceleration scale
value.tooltip: (warthogs, ghosts) The maximum allowable change in throttle between ticks

value.name: ai throttle blend
value.tooltip: (dropships, sentinels) The degree of throttle blending between one tick and the next (0 = no blending)

value.name: theoretical max speed
value.tooltip: (dropships, warthogs, ghosts) About how fast I can go.

value.name: error scale
value.tooltip: (dropships, warthogs) scale on the difference between desired and actual speed, applied to throttle

value.name: ai charge tight angle distance
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) The distance at which the tight angle criterion is used for deciding to vehicle charge

value.name: ai charge tight angle
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) Angle cosine within which the target must be when target is closer than tight angle distance in order to charge

value.name: ai charge repeat timeout
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) Time delay between vehicle charges

value.name: ai charge look-ahead time
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) In deciding when to abort vehicle charge, look ahead these many seconds to predict time of contact

value.name: ai charge consider distance
value.tooltip: Consider charging the target when it is within this range (0 = infinite distance)

value.name: ai charge abort distance
value.tooltip: Abort the charge when the target get more than this far away (0 = never abort)

value.name: vehicle ram timeout
value.tooltip: The ram behavior stops after a maximum of the given number of seconds

value.name: ram paralysis time
value.tooltip: The ram behavior freezes the vehicle for a given number of seconds after performing the ram

value.name: ai cover damage threshold
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) Trigger a cover when recent damage is above given threshold (damage_vehicle_cover impulse)

value.name: ai cover min distance
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) When executing vehicle-cover, minimum distance from the target to flee to

value.name: ai cover time
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) How long to stay away from the target

value.name: ai cover min boost distance
value.tooltip: (All vehicles) Boosting allowed when distance to cover destination is greater then this.

value.name: turtling recent damage threshold
value.tooltip: If vehicle turtling behavior is enabled, turtling is initiated if 'recent damage' surpasses the given threshold

value.name: turtling min time
value.tooltip: If the vehicle turtling behavior is enabled, turtling occurs for at least the given time

value.name: turtling timeout
value.tooltip: The turtled state times out after the given number of seconds
